title: Men's Stretch Cotton Knit Warm Henley Shirt Casual Long Sleeve Top
description: MATERIAL: Made from a soft 93.5% cotton, 6.5% spandex fabric, this long sleeve shirt is perfect for cooler temperatures.
FEATURES: Ribbed trim on the collar and cuffs, a stylish three-button placket, and delicate half-moon detailing at the back of the neck are all features of this men's long-sleeve knit shirt.
Size：Detailed product size description can be seen below, please check! if you are not sure about the size, please feel free to ask us and we can help you.
Garment Care: Hand Wash or Machine Wash in Cold Water, Not bleach
OCCASION: This loose fit men's henley shirt is perfect for cozy casual wear and will help keep you warm on fall evenings and cool weekend mornings.
